channel.title: Moparcraft castle
channel.description:
Dear players,
I started playing minecraft in september but always played in single player world. About 2 weeks ago i started playing multiplayer. I maded a home (really smal) but decided to get something better. This is my first big building. Only the shape is finished. The interior is not finished and will get finished and then posted here. Please give constructive critism instead of yelling at me that i'm a noob that can't build anything.
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/oh7ays.jpg[/img]
1)The upper tower needs to move a little bit to the right 2)I'm sorry for the bad symmetric. I started to built without looking to the fitting part.
This can be found in World 1.
Thanks for reading, halflive9

use a combination of cobble and stone bricks, trust me looks sexy

item.title: Moparcraft castle
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

i will have to agree with tarkoff. instead of cobblestone, try using stonebrick. it will make a massive improvement.

other then that, it is pretty nice m8 8)

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft castle
item.dc:creator: @Tarkoff Tarkoff
item.description:
@Tarkoff wrote:

I like it a lot. After you fix the symmetric problems I would try experimenting with some other building materials other then cobble stone.
Try adding some different colour wood or even some cooked stone work. People think that big buildings are impressive but I love building take time for the small details.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft castle
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:7, topic:424644”]I think it looks very good, looking forward to seeing more improvements!

@Tom, what do you mean ‘blown up’? There aren’t supposed to be creepers in world 1?[/quote]There are, they just take the form of players.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft castle
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Moparisthebest:

@Tom, what do you mean ‘blown up’? There aren’t supposed to be creepers in world 1?

It certainly looks like it’s been blown up, or I think a better way of putting it would be griefed with fire. I was mainly getting at the fact that W1 is crippled and war torn with no future unless someone cleans it up.

Considering you’ll never delete it I may as well start an effort to fix it :rolleyes:

Read full topic

Thank you guys, i will keep working on it and will try to improve it
